alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:46PM EDT until September 08 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Windham County in southern Vermont... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 345 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brattleboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Putney, Vernon, Westminster, Guilford Center, Guilford, North Vernon, East Dummerston, East Putney, Fairview Village, Grove, East Putney Station, Dummerston Center, West Brattleboro, Putney Station, Packer Corner, West Guilford, Green River, Naulahka and Westminster Station. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
